title: Mastery Error
body: If I alter my masteries in the Alpha during pick the masteries won't stick and I'll be left key-stoneless in-game.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Yeah, this is super shitty. We're working on a fix as we speak and it should be going in the next day or so.

Could I just add that the mastery page is really slow, and that setting them up takes a lot longer than in the old client. 
(this could be a problem, like in my own case, as I usually edit the masteries right before the match starts).
Thanks man! I really appreciate it!
